results.name: Expansion of e.g.f. exp(2 * (1 - exp(-x)) + x).
mathematica: nmax = 25; CoefficientList[Series[Exp[2 (1 - Exp[-x]) + x], {x, 0, nmax}], x] Range[0, nmax]!
program: (PARI)  my(N=33, x='x+O('x^N)); Vec(serlaplace(exp(2 * (1 - exp(-x)) + x))) \\ _Joerg Arndt_, Jul 04 2020
